relationsQuery: select 'FK_' || TARGETOBJ || '_' || OBJECTNAME || '_' || LOGICALRELATIONSHIP.LOGICALRELATIONSHIPID as FK_NAME, 'PK_' || OBJECTNAME || '_' || TARGETOBJ || '_' || LOGICALRELATIONSHIP.LOGICALRELATIONSHIPID as PK_NAME, TARGETOBJ as FKTABLE_NAME, OBJECTNAME as PKTABLE_NAME, KEYNUM as KEY_SEQ, TARGETKEY as FKCOLUMN_NAME, PARENTKEY as PKCOLUMN_NAME from LOGICALRELATIONSHIP join LRKEYS on LOGICALRELATIONSHIP.LOGICALRELATIONSHIPID = LRKEYS.LOGICALRELATIONSHIPID WHERE TARGETOBJ = ?;
